title: gulpfile.js
description: This directory contains all gulp taks. By using the name `gulpfile.js` gulp will read the `index.js` file as the actual `gulpfile.js`.

sections.title: Tasks
description: Contains all gulp tasks. The default task calls all other tasks. Each task can also be called individually. Use `npm run` to use the local gulp

sections.title: Utils
description: Gulp utilities are helpers for gulp tasks (ie. pretty printing log messages to the console, handling errors, and pretty printing time).

sections.title: Config
description: Contains gulp configuration for the project, and for each individual task. This should be used instead of editing gulp tasks unless trying to change task functionality entirely.
